name: Divine Benison
help:
Creates a barrier around target that absorbs damage totaling 25% of target's maximum HP.
Duration: 10s
Additional Effect: Reduces Divine Benison recast time by a percentage corresponding to the number of healing Lilies stacked at time of action execution (at which time the Lilies are removed)

1 Lily: 10%
2 Lilies: 25%
3 Lilies: 50%
